OOC:My bad so sorry but as I said before this move did come with 
consecences and when I do use it my char is out of ammo until he gets 
time to requip some.  But I am not arguing this I will take the 
concils words please forgive a newbie still a little new. The reason 
I did it was because I am trying to obliterate Dewboy from this rpg

IC:Auron smiles and comes down folding his wings around him as he 
brings up his hand shooting out his plasma saber running forward 
toward Hottie
